quest.name: Delivery Time
journal:
 Quest Sync
The flustered sentinel looks at you expectantly.
objectives: Deliver the fur blanket and purified water to the flustered sentinel.

dialogue.name: KINDVIIS03468
dialogue.text: Normally I would not think to make a request of the allies of Ronka, but this is an emergency.

dialogue.name: KINDVIIS03468
dialogue.text: One of our sisters is in labor. Would you help us make ready for the delivery?

dialogue.name: KINDVIIS03468
dialogue.text: I have asked Olmet to prepare a blanket for the child, and Ciuille fresh water.

dialogue.name: KINDVIIS03468
dialogue.text: Time is of the essence. Go and speak with Olmet and Ciuille. They will have what we need.

dialogue.name: OLMET
dialogue.text: Ah, I was told someone would be coming. Here─a blanket of our finest fur. Go on, now. They will be waiting.

dialogue.name: CIUILLE
dialogue.text: It is time, then? I finished purifying the water but moments ago. The child's ears must be cleansed before first hearkening to the call of the woods.

dialogue.name: OLMET
dialogue.text: I will not keep you. The others are waiting for that blanket.

dialogue.name: CIUILLE
dialogue.text: Be careful not to spill the water.

dialogue.name: KINDVIIS03468
dialogue.text: Do you have the blanket and water?

dialogue.name: KINDVIIS03468
dialogue.text: Good, good. With this, everything is in order.

dialogue.name: KINDVIIS03468
dialogue.text: It has been far too long since any of our sisters has given birth.

dialogue.name: KINDVIIS03468
dialogue.text: You honor us with your assistance. Would that we could allow you to meet the child once born.

dialogue.name: KINDVIIS03468
dialogue.text: To ensure their safety, it is strictly forbidden for any save the wet nurse and immediate family to see them. Even should the opportunity never arise, make no mistake: the child will hear of your deeds. You have my word on that.
